title: Conduct a Workplace Safety Audit
description: The EHS (Environment, Health, and Safety) manager is conducting a safety audit of a manufacturing plant.

tasks.description: Review the plant's safety records and past incidents.
tasks.expected_outcome: EHS manager reviews the safety logs for the past year.

tasks.description: Conduct a physical walkthrough of the plant using a safety checklist.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager inspects the facility and documents any potential hazards (e.g., blocked fire exits, unlabeled chemicals).

tasks.description: Create a corrective action plan based on the audit findings and assign owners for each item.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager creates a report with required actions and assigns them to the plant manager.
